name: Dogs Cyberpuzzle
description:
• A jigsaw puzzle like you've never seen before.

  • Drag & drop and rotate the pieces to complete the puzzles within the time limit. Time gets shorter and shorter as the levels go by.

  • 2 videos per level so you can solve the puzzles placing the pieces strategically according to the areas of each video.

  • Enjoy the awesome synthwave tracks.

  • 51 Achievements. Are you fast enough to unlock all of them?

  • Finish the game to unlock Kitty's message. It contains extremely important information about the future.


..

..
